alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 24 at 8:32PM EDT until September 25 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the Maryland counties of Talbot, Caroline, Queen Anne`s and Kent. * WHEN...Until 8:00 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in bayside communities and along tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at Tolchester Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.8 ft, Major 3.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 25/03 AM 3.8 2.1 1.6 Minor 25/03 PM 2.6 0.9 1.2 None 26/04 AM 3.0 1.3 0.8 None 26/05 PM 2.3 0.6 0.7 None 27/06 AM 3.2 1.5 1.0 None Eastern Bay at Claiborne MLLW Categories - Minor 3.4 ft, Moderate 4.4 ft, Major 5.4 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.7 ft, Moderate 2.7 ft, Major 3.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 25/01 AM 3.8 2.1 1.9 Minor 25/01 PM 2.7 1.0 1.5 None 26/02 AM 2.8 1.1 0.9 None 26/02 PM 2.3 0.6 0.9 None 27/02 AM 3.1 1.4 1.3 None 27/03 PM 3.1 1.4 1.6 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
